title: zxcvbm,
summary_text: Quarterly Board Update — Transcript (abridged) Date: 2025-10-16 Attendees: @ceo, @cfo, @pm_arul, @lead_shiva, @data_alex Opening: - Overview of Q3 goals, risks, and hiring plan.
key_points: Quarterly Board Update — Transcript (abridged) Date: 2025-10-16 Attendees: @ceo, @cfo, @pm_arul, @lead_shiva, @data_alex Opening: - Overview of Q3 goals, risks, and hiring plan.
Status: - Revenue tracking slightly above plan; support tickets down 12%.
- Upload → Summarize → Store flow works; parsing for PDF/DOCX pending final tests.
- Pilot users want CSV/Markdown export of Key Points, Decisions, Action Items.
Discussion: - We will prioritize export endpoints and a visible History panel for demos.
- Agreed to keep temperature low for consistency; retries will stay at 3.
- Concern: transcripts over 2 hours—consider chunking with overlap and warning banners.
Notes: - @data_alex shared that VTT from Zoom is the most common format.
decisions: Quarterly Board Update — Transcript (abridged) Date: 2025-10-16 Attendees: @ceo, @cfo, @pm_arul, @lead_shiva, @data_alex Opening: - Overview of Q3 goals, risks, and hiring plan. Status: - Revenue tracking slightly above plan; support tickets down 12%. - Upload → Summarize → Store flow works; parsing for PDF/DOCX pending final tests. - Pilot users want CSV/Markdown export of Key Points, Decisions, Action Items. Discussion: - We will prioritize export endpoints and a visible History panel for demos. - Agreed to keep temperature low for consistency; retries will stay at 3. - Concern: transcripts over 2 hours—consider chunking with overlap and warning banners. Notes: - @data_alex shared that VTT from Zoom is the most common format. - Let's assign explicit owners to action items with due dates. Decisions: - Decided to cap uploads at 50 MB and show a warning on large files. - We will expose GET /api/summaries/{id}/export.csv and /export.md. Action Items: - @lead_shiva implement CSV + Markdown export endpoints — due 2025-10-20 - @pm_arul add History list UI with version picker — due 2025-10-19 - @data_alex validate PDF/DOCX parsing on 5 real samples — deadline 2025-10-21 - Follow up with pilot users about chunking needs — by 2025-10-22 Closing: - Next review on 2025-10-23; send notes to all attendees.
- Agreed to keep temperature low for consistency; retries will stay at 3.
Decisions: - Decided to cap uploads at 50 MB and show a warning on large files.

- Pilot users want CSV/Markdown export of Key Points, Decisions, Action Items.
Discussion: - We will prioritize export endpoints and a visible History panel for demos.
- Agreed to keep temperature low for consistency; retries will stay at 3.
- Let's assign explicit owners to action items with due dates.
